text: Nuko Umunyamisiri wamuguze abwira umugore we ati “Mwakire kandi umugirire neza, wenda yazatugirira akamaro cyangwa tukamugira umwana.” Uko ni ko twatuje Yusufu mu gihugu (cya Misiri, tumugira umunyacyubahiro) tunamwigisha gusobanura inzozi. Kandi Allah afite ubushobozi bwo gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo ashaka, nyamara abenshi mu bantu ntibabizi
